data.actual_result: A white highlight appears which makes the text in button hard to see.
data.expected_result: Like all other similar buttons, a black/grey highlight appears.
data.short_description: The verify account button is the only button with a white highlight which makes the text in it almost invisible on long press.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new account and join a server with at least the second level of verification. - Long press on the "Verify Account" button.
